name: Mom's Buttermilk Pancakes
author: Cinnken
summary: These pancakes are passed down from my grandmother, who was fully Scandinavian. They are light and fluffy, and great with berry syrups. I have made these for years as a special treat, and I hope you enjoy them as much as my family has.
directions: Preheat and lightly grease a large skillet or electric griddle
Mix the flour, salt, and baking soda together in a bowl
Add the egg, buttermilk, and butter; stir together lightly, but keep it lumpy
The batter should look thick, spongy, and puffy
Drop 1/3 cup of the batter onto the cooking surface, spreading lightly with the bottom of the cup
Cook until lightly-browned on each side, 1 to 2 minutes per side
